author: dweiss
msg: LUCENE-4160: Bring back the functional equivalent of tests.iters.min. Added two properties: -Dtests.maxfailures=M and -Dtests.failfast=[true/false/yes/no/on/off] which control skipping tests after the first M failures have been hit or after the first failure (failfast is an alias for tests.maxfailures=1).

author: tcurdt
msg: some cleanups, mostly white space and style changes, re-implementation of getIterator

author: kwall
msg: QPID-4094: Qpid MC misformats JMX notification dates
Fix date format string so date is properly formatted to the 24 hour clock.

author: ilgrosso
msg: Refactoring ParameterCacheKey Sitemap-safe instantiation with a factory method
